exceptions.tactic: apply (Z_rec P (Zrec1 P) (Zrec2 P) (Zrec3 P) p).
exceptions.exn: In environment P : Z -> Set H : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n p : Z The term "Zrec1 P" has type "(forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> P OZ" while it is expected to have type "P OZ".

original: intros P H n p. apply (Z_rec P (Zrec1 P) (Zrec2 P) (Zrec3 P) p).
